text: Just onboarded a few weeks ago - CRM Starter Suite. I strongly recommend that you unlock the SEO features 100% at this level. It is critical for us to build organic traffic (and convert it) so that we can afford to move up to the next upgrade tier (Professional) sooner, rather than later. Frankly it is a little odd that you don't already do this! That said, this is literally my only gripe about the platform - it's near perfect so far :heart:
Hey Chad, if you’re looking for some more SEO tools at the starter level, I highly suggest checking out <https://ahrefs.com/|ahrefs>; that’s what I use in combination with my starter CMS site.
Nice! Thanks <@U26BLKGE4> I’ll check this out. My fallback plan was SEMrush (I have an account - was trying to jettison), but I’ll certainly check this out.
